website_summaries.verdict: Effortless slip-on style, thanks to the elastic bands. Lightly distressed, but not overly so. Comfortable, stylish choice when traditional sneakers just won't do.
pros: Lightweight, stylish slip-ons that work well with skinny jeans
Durable enough for boating and bike riding
Comes in a variety of colors
Vegan-friendly canvas uppers with elastic bands
Lightly cushioned footbed and rubber outsole
cons: Bottoms of the shoes can be slippery

customer_reviews.title: Fits a tad bit but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9.5, sometimes a 9, and these fit a bit big in a 9 for me. The overall comfort of the shoe is good (large toe box, the heel doesn’t rub) but the shoe has very little padding so I don’t see wearing these for lots of walking. I’m going to add an insert with some arch support and see if that helps. But for fashion and light walking, I highly recommend. Very cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and supportive. Cute shoe for everyday. I got the marley size 8. True to size, except the one elastic strap at tge top seems a tad snug for me. Im sure over time i can stretch it out. Otherwise a really cute shoe for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers I own
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April of 2017, it’s now December 2018 and I am having to get a new pair. But considering I wore these to Disneyland 20+ times ( avg guest walks 7+ miles in Disneyland) ,2 trips to Vegas , and I wore these most every day last summer! I’d say these got their use! They are the comfiest shoes I own! And they go with everything! They’re easy to clean too! I spilled beer on them and turned them brown for a week but once I got some bleach on a toothbrush and scrubbed a little. The stain came right out. going to buy them again since the pair I own as almost been worn through.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Like these a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot. I wear a size 8-8.5. I ordered an 8.5, and they fit perfectly. I've been walking around in them all day and they are not rubbing my feet anywhere - they're really comfortable right out of the box. Note that they are narrow shoes - if you have wide feet, they may not work for you. Finally, I ordered the steel grey color and they are for sure more of a greenish color than grey. I like the color, but FYI on the actual color if you won't be happy with a shade of green. I will be ordering more in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Great shoe for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great styling. Well constructed (just received and hope they wear well) Fits true to size. Looks much more expensive than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look great and I would recommend them but would recommend a ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because they are flat but they did not run true to size with the rest of my shoes. The shoes look great and I would recommend them but would recommend a 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: N Holland

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLY CHEAP!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an upgrade from my old slip ons. These are just as bad. The only ONE LY thing going for them, is they're comfy. They take LONGER than my knee high boots, to put on! The tongue is annoying and just bunches up, it's beyond infuriating. The back folds down so putting the shoe on is an even bigger pain. The WORST PART: The soles come out!! Is there anything more obnoxious than the sole coming out EVERY SINGLE TIME YOU TAKE OFF YOUR SHOES?! These are CHEAP DOLLAR STORE SHOES. CHEAP CHEAP SHOES. My old dirt kickers are better.
customer_reviews.author: Bye Bye Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Blowfish Marley so much that I have about 6 pr in several colors! They are easy to put on. No need to break these in. I had purchased my first pair in a store so I knew what size to order. They run true to size. I have a wide foot and I still have room. That being said, if you have a very narrow foot, you might be able to go down half a size. I usually wear anywhere from a 7 - 8 and mine are all 7 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: Beware. These shoes run small!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely frustrated, because little did I know, these shoes run small and narrow. I ordered my normal size, and I could barely get these on. There was absolutely no wiggle room, and they were super narrow, so my toes were crunched on both sides. Very uncomfortable. They are cute, but if you decide to order, I'd size up half a size. Unfortunately, if you are a size 10 like me, you don't get the option of sizing up a half size. Why is there not a 10.5? I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I have had numerous comments about where did I get them and how cute they are. They are comfortable and very stylish. I like the worn out look so these Are just what I like !! I've been wearing them with shorts but I think they'll look great with jeans . They are a very casual shoe but cute . I bought them on Amazon because they were the best price I had priced them at at least 20 different places online and Amazon beat everyone surprise ...
customer_reviews.author: debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fit on the tight side!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After wearing these for a whole day I decided to return for a 6.5, and they fit much better! I have very small, narrow feet. I'm consistently a size 6. So I'd recommend going up a 1/2 size with these shoes. ORIGINAL REVIEW: Giving 4 stars because overall these are good shoes and very cute! However, I got size 6 (my normal size) and I wanted to wear these without socks, but they put blisters on my heel when I tried doing that. They fit tight even with socks. I also have to say that they do not have great traction... Wouldn't recommend these for anyone elderly!
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Great looking casual sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these sneakers! Super cute and look good with just about anything. I walked the entire zoo (one of the best and biggest in the country) and my feet stayed cool, did not ache, and my son spilled orange pop on them and it dried quickly without staining! Added bonus, I can wear them to work which has a business casual dresscode. Definitely my new go-to casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: goobsmagee

customer_reviews.title: Size appears to be a roll of the dice.
customer_reviews.text: My regular size is a 7. Reviews seemed to indicate the size was a big large. I stuck with my regular 7 and, while the width is wide in the toe box and a bit narrow in the heel, which is actually perfect for me, the length is short. The shoe is cute, but it doesn't slip on easily because of a tight upper elastic, and once it's on, my toes are right up against the shoe. I'm going to keep them but I won't be wearing them if I know I'll be doing a lot of walking. I don't want a bigger size because I think the shoe would be too big in every way except the length.
customer_reviews.author: Philautia

customer_reviews.title: runs about half size small. not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and seem decent quality-- a bit higher quality than I'd expect from shoes at Target. I usually wear size 8 very comfortably, but these size 8 feel more like a 7.5, with a little tightness only on my right foot (which is slightly larger). After wearing them for two work days and wearing a bandaid to prevent a blister on my right heel, the shoe had stretched enough to be written comfortably and no blisters. I have average or slightly narrow feet and they fit perfect in width for me. For the cost and cute style, I'm satisfied and wear them often now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, very pleased when it arrived. More importantly, as a person who lives with a chronic condition that causes joint swelling & pain, this shoe cushions my foot in just the right areas to reduce pain. I've had to stop wearing so many of the shoes that previously had been my "go-to" shoes because of pain. I was looking for a pair that was cute and looked like it may work with my situation. Happily, I was right on target with these. I just ordered a 2nd pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Back for a second pair!! 🙌
customer_reviews.text: I love my Blowfish shoes and am back for a second pair. Because gray goes with anything, I wore the HECK out of these things for nearly TWO years! I'm not giving them up so time for a fresh pair. 😁👍 I initially went with a half size larger than my usual size to allow for the snug toe box and they fit pretty perfectly. So I did the same for the second pair. I also trimmed the threads a couple times to keep the look neat. Give yourself a little time to break them in and you'll be all set!! **Size 10, Steel Grey Color Washed Canvas**
customer_reviews.author: LizK

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe & was excited to wear them! I wore them to work ( I work on my feet for 8 hours a day) and by 11 my pinky toes were killing me. Also...the bottoms of these shoes have a FELT LIKE material on them. What on earth? I didn't notice this until I literally slipped on the tile floor & nearly fell 😭 I slipped maybe 7 times in 4 hours. WHY IS THERE FELT ON THE SOLES of these shoes? Yes there is rubber, but felt covers the rubber. I find this extremely unsafe. I will try to add a pic of this part. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SKTB

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the look - i got the white and they are a little cooler and funner than just plain keds. I am a size 10, but I find they are just a little tight in the toes and so I can't wear them for a long time or if I am walking a lot. Also, the back rubs a bit on my heel, so I have to wear them with socks. I am keeping them for occasional use, but I just wish they fit a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Popular in my house
customer_reviews.text: This show is great! I tried to get my seventh grader to buy them as one of her back-to-school shoes but she refused. I thought they were so cute that I ordered them for me. I wore them for about a week till she started to steal them from me. Finally, I ordered myself another pair and let her have the original ones! We love these shoes. Even my 9 year old wants a pair but Inal having trouble finding a pair in her size. Buy them! They are cute and convenient (they slip right on!).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cute looking and look just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes, I did read that the soles were smooth and slippery so was not surprised. Walked on cement and scuffed them up a bit and not not slippery. Cute looking and look just like the picture. Bought a 8 and fit just right for a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Asia's  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Get them in every color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I saw them on a boutique on FB going for $55 and I was sure they'd be cheaper on Amazon and sure enough I got them them for less than $32. They hurt my feet the first couple of go around when I wore them with super thin Nike socks so after letting my feet rest for a few days I tried them again sockless and they're soooooo much better!:
customer_reviews.author: ShalynP

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little shoe - great color - no laces to bother with. I love them ! I am a size 7-1/2, sometimes 8. I ordered the 7-1/2 and they're perfect. I have a bit of a narrow heel so I'm thinking of adding a heel pad to my right shoe but that's not the shoe's fault. They are made well and comfortable enough for light walking. I wouldn't go power walking all day downtown and expect my poor old feet not to hurt but for my occasional walks to the nearby shopping center, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TeeInVa

customer_reviews.title: Love blowfish shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to find athletic/tennis shoes that don't change parts of my feet. Generally I have to buy extra cushioning to make the shoes work (more money and worry). I'm so happy it looks like j won't have to do that with these!! The shoes fit a bit snug, but I don't mind that (I wear 7.5-8 and got a 7.5). I like that these slip on and off. I bought these for work as a nanny and I'm really excited to try them out :D
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Keffer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes- very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving these shoes! I just received them a few days ago, and have already worn a handful of times, and they fit just right and are comfortable on my feet for long periods of time. And they are super cute! I read several reviews stating that they were narrower than expected, and while I noticed that a bit, it wasn’t significant enough for it to feel uncomfortable or be too snug (and I’d say my feet are just very average in length, width, etc.). I am usually between an 8 and 8.5 in most shoes, so I opted for the 8.5, and was glad I did. The 8 definitely would have felt too small.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off - great price if you can get them for $19.99
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife for Christmas. She wanted something that she could get on and off quickly for when walks the dogs. She likes the style and the fit. She has high arches and said these aren't too tight across the top of her foot and don't slip off when she walks. We'll see if they hold up. I bought them when they were just $19.99 - great price. Her other pair of Blowfish sneakers lasted only one season. The soles started to wear thin and even with inserts she could feel every bump, stone, etc. on the road - so we'll see how these do.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT PAOLINI

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, comfortable..size down by 1/2.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of these slip ons by this company. I have in leopard, camouflage, and 2 floral prints. They are cute on and durable. I throw them in the washer and set out to dry. Comfortable put of the box. I usually wear 8 bit find that the 7.5 works better for me in this brand. I wear these with everything from sun dresses, shorts, jeans.... cant go wrong. UPDATE: just bought another pair in the "lion wash" not yellow not gold. Love the color..it goes in the neutral category and can be worn with just about everything!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair of canvas sneakers for awhile, after searching online I found these. I was a little hesitant after reading some negative reviews but decided to try them out. I am so happy I did! I love these sneakers, they fit well, are comfortable! They don't pinch around my toes like some of the other reviews I've read. Shipping was fast and they look adorable! I will definitely be purchasing more colors! I got the grey color, which looks like it has a bit of a green tint to it (army green) but nothing that would clash with an outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but nice
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I probably could have ordered a size down because it’s so roomy, but I needed it for the next day. Well made, cute shoe. Love blowfish Malibu! Wish they were not as $$ but love them. Note: The insoles are not connected into the shoe, so they can drag out as you take the shoe off. I see this as a positive- tennis shoes can get smelly so having a replaceable insole can extend longevity. Fine for walking but not a cushiony sole for running and cannot be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staaaaay Away!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo buying an all white fabric sneaker is always risk for getting dirty but no big deal throw it in the washing machine with my whites right??? Wrong!!!! The stupid tan/brownish tag at the back of the shoe bled alllllllll throughout the shoes and some of my white clothing. To say I was utterly pissed and disappointment is an understatement. I wore these twice for only a few hrs each while on vacation in Vegas and I’m a careful walker when I have white shoes! There is no reason to by these as it’s impossible to keep clean and they are not able to be put in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible shoes do not bother!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible fit, so narrow, you feel like you had your feet bound trying to put them on and the smell of the materials was so toxic I almost passed out when I opened the box. That's what you get by sourcing your materials from other countries who will remain nameless except it rhymes with Aunt Jemima. Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: Adaria Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Look narrow but very comfortable (even for wide feet.)
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived they looked very cute but very narrow. I wasn’t sure if they would fit my foot comfortably because my feet are slightly wider, but after wearing them for a day I was pleasantly surprised. They were very comfortable and not too snug. I bought the size I normally wear and they are perfect. They look exactly like the photos show, are comfortable, and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Manda983

customer_reviews.title: Nice cute comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and they fit like they should. I wear an 8 and bought size 8 and they fit perfectly. They feel great with no break-in period. The bottom is rubber but I feel myself slipping and sliding on my ceramic tile and hardwood floors. I'm hoping they will rough up some after a while. Great shoe at a reasonable price but whoever came up with "gray" for these OLIVE GREEN shoes might want to see their opthamologist asap!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Was sent the wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both a floral and cheetah print. I bought a previous pair of the cheetah on the right and I love them but have worn them out. So I wanted another pair. Those came in perfect. But the floral pair is a least a size or a size and half smaller than what it’s supposed to be! It says 10 on the box and the sicker on the bottom but is definitely not a 10! And I was really looking forward to those! And now I can’t wear them I would really like to send them back but can’t find a way to contact y’all to get this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie McClure

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS AS VERY SLIPPERY BOTTOMS
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but worried I'm going to fall as the bottoms are extremely slippery. Need to buy something to put on bottom so I don't slip or just return them.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I wear either 8 or 8.5, depending on the brand. In this brand I ordered an 8.5 but think they may run a little big? I’m keeping them though, I love them. It’s the corduroy like material along with the stretchy built in laces that really set this shoe apart. I got a compliment on them the first time I’ve worn them. I also love the navy blue, as it’s my fave color. I have other Blowfish sneakers, and this style is in my top 2.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy70

customer_reviews.title: Start to fray after 2-3 uses-CUTE BUT CHEAPLY MADE!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes started fraying (just the right shoe not the left shoe) after two or three times of wearing. Unfortunately I didn’t wear them until going on vacation and the window of returning them has closed (by less than a week).They were very cute before I started wearing them. Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mssz

customer_reviews.title: Not for my wide feet :(
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 W and after reading some reviews, I felt confident in ordering a 6.5 (since wide wasn't an option). I was able to get the shoe on my foot but it felt a bit too snug. I'm bummed because the shoe is super cute but I have to return them. I'm also disappointed that I have to pay to return the shoes but I guess I didn't pay attention to that when I ordered them. I've never had to pay to return an item to Amazon before.
customer_reviews.author: My3Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, when I first tried these on I was sure I would be sending them back. They felt snug at first. But I decided to give them a try. Within an hour of wearing them around, these had stretched and are as comfy as can be. I wear a size 9 and my feet are a tad wide, and the 9's fit perfect. They are very cute as well. I liked them so much I bought another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slippery shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes from Blowfish Malibu are extremely cheap and slippery!! The white part of the shoe is the only rubber part. Skimming through the reviews I am surprised no one spoke of this. I put on my pair and slid on my carpet, tile, and hard wood floors! It does not matter how cute someone may think these shoes are if you are injured due to their product!! The description does state they have an synthetic sole. They may also want to add WEAR AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: The shoes looked like they were made sloppy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look cute but they looked like they were made in a rush. There are a lot of thread hanging from the stitches i usually but a 9 and they were way too big. They fit loosely all over and my heels would slip out of the shoe when I walked. I don’t know if they would be comfortable as I returned them. I will not buy from this company again as this is the second time I returned shoes from them
customer_reviews.author: T. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Perfect for summer and spring wear. They fit like a glove and are totally true to size. I wear a 7.5 always and these shoes fit perfect. The only thing to watch for, is these shoes are “Sweet Gray Color Washed Canvas” and turned out a light gray. When you look at the colors on the main page it shows a white shoe instead of a gray one... Originally I wanted a white shoe so purchased these, they came gray and I stuck with them because they’re super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and I ordered the size I usually wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and I ordered the size I usually wear and it was just right. The only constructive thing about them is that they are flat, which I prefer, but there wasn't a lot of padding to absorb walking. I added some heel inserts and it's been perfect. Would certainly buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: angela galanti

customer_reviews.title: My go to slip ons
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They are cute and comfortable. I do have narrow feet and they fit just right, so if yours are wider, you may find them to be a bit snug. As they are, I wear a size 10 with a slightly longer right foot. At first, I was afraid they were too short, but with a day's wear, they eased up just enough to be perfect. I actually don't know why I like the styling so much. I am very fond of my Chuck Taylor's as well, but these slip on quickly and I just think they are a cute alternative canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Slusser

customer_reviews.title: No traction but overall good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable but do not have any traction on the bottom as there is a layer of fuzz on the bottom so I can't wear them on any surfaces like tile or hardwood because I slip. I bought these after buying the grey pair specifically because the grey pair had grip on the bottom and I needed shoes that would provide traction. I've kept the shoes because I like them overall but am very limited on where I can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casually stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and generally don't need much support. These were a great fit for me. I wore them all day, photographing a wedding, with a thin pair of socks and had no issues with my feet hurting (just general tiredness from being on my feet all day, haha). Definitely recommend for those looking for a shoe to go with jeans, leggings, sweats, casual dresses, shorts... really anything besides dress wear. The blue sole is a fun touch. But I think narrow feet and little support needed will be best!
customer_reviews.author: themittenresale

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fell in love with these!!! And they are SOOOOOO comfortable and stylish! They fit true to size though when I first put my foot in them I thought they were too snug and maybe needed to go a half size up but before I even walked around the house more than 10 minutes it was like they magically adjusted to the perfect fit! Can’t go wrong with this one!!! I’m definitely ordering more colors and styles in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Yevette D.

customer_reviews.title: HIT
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the s#!t. Love them in every possible way, forever and ever. No doubt one of the few pairs of shoes on Amazon that have been a good purchase- if you've experienced anything similar with shoes online and how hit or miss it can be... These are a hit. And they're so darn cute. I like them way better than chucks. I will always reorder these to make sure I have a pair. Can't say enough good things about these shoes. The white canvass was my first choice but I'd explore some of the other ones too.
customer_reviews.author: AMCsd

customer_reviews.title: Blowfish Marley shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable slip-on sneakers. They are a tad tight in the width, but as they were not offered in a Wide width, I ordered the medium width. Since they are canvas, I'm hoping they stretch out somewhat. At any rate, I am very pleased with them. I love that the pattern has multiple colors so that they can be worn with almost every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have slightly wide feet, and the stretch “laces” on this style are great. They aren’t too tight, and I can teach in these all day with no problems. If you need arch support, you’ll probably need an insert because they don’t provide much, but otherwise this is a comfortable, cute shoe that I wear several times a week all day long.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fits perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes!!! They are perfect fit, comfortable and cool to wear i the hot summer temperature I don’t feel as if my feet are sweating. I love the green color looks nice even even my husband liked them which is odd for him. Bottom line great price, awesome shoe, looks cute. Doesn’t have arch support but I can eased my orthopedic device.
customer_reviews.author: Pura Vida

customer_reviews.title: Cute trendy shoe at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a good buy. It is a little snug in the toe box but is comfortable. I have a narrow foot so that helps. It was a little greener than the gray I thought I was getting but I loved it anyway. I wish it had a little more arch support but for a casual trendy shoe it fits the bill. I will be getting other colors as well! I pair it with a sock liner and it’s perfect! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wear out quick looking old
customer_reviews.text: Although I like the style and fit I would not buy again. Only worn them a handle full of times and already threads are lose everywhere. As you can see in pictures they're are tons of lose threads making them look worn and old. They are comfy and versatile but quality isn't great. They also get scuffs and marked up quickly a pain to keep looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was a little narrow for me so I had to return it. My feet are wide so I always order 1 size up. That works only sometimes and this time it didn't. I walk a lot and this shoe was completely flat inside, so no arch support. So not the shoe for me. But the shoe was really nice looking and I really wanted to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Electra Small

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable while looking good
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 9, my normal size and I’m glad I did. My feet are mostly narrow but I have a wider toe box and that leads to a lot of shoes fitting too tight. As other reviews mention, these shoes stretch nicely. They seemed too tight at first, but they stretched almost right away and once my feet were in them they felt fine. I really like the color and style as well. I will probably get another color!
customer_reviews.author: K.M

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten so many compliments on these shoes! I love the Blowfish brand and have a lot of their styles. The leopard shoes are by far my favorite! You can easily dress them up or down. They’re super cute and comfortable if you walk around a lot! I’d highly recommend! I usually wear a 7.5 or an 8. I would say these fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki V.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I ordered, however the color isn't what is listed. I ordered grey, but the picture shows a green color. Either way, still cute. My only complaint is the tread on the bottom is lacking traction since it seems like it's made out of plastic rather than rubber and is very smooth. Don't wear these when it rains out, but otherwise a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: laura Busch

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: The grey color looks more olive green than grey to me. I have had to purchase arch support insoles to insert into the shoe to get any support at all. The sides rub against my outside ankle bone so also need extra padding inside the shoe to lift my foot up a bit to stop the rubbing. They are okay but not great. Needed modifying to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bully4me

customer_reviews.title: I Love my new shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these they fit perfectly but I probably could have went up a half size because the toe box is a tad tight but after wearing them for a week they have broke in very nicely and it wasn't so tight that I needed to return them or anything. But the part I love the most about the shoes.. they really do go with everything! That's exactly what sold me on buying them too. So If you are looking for a comfortable shoe that will go with all your casual wear definitely buy these! I plan on buying more in the future in different colors myself. I ordered a size 7
customer_reviews.author: Eclectictwist

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe, however absolutely flat soles..No cushioning whatsoever..I bought an insert for the shoe, helps some, but no real cushioning..The shoe slaps as you walk. Very annoying on hard floors. With an insert of course, the shoe is somewhat tight. It will work for me as an indoor shoe..Not for any kind of walking outside..
customer_reviews.author: fithofanickel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute! No foot sweat when worn w no socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slip ons! Wish they had more colors in my size. Got the olive colored ones and seriously obsessed. Major bonus - no feet sweat! I wear them without socks and never feel sweaty or gross. Actually it feels comfy and soft w no socks! Worn in heat for hours as a true test! Big fan! Want the grey striped ones but they don’t have them in my size. Hopefully soon!
customer_reviews.author: tara williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but size is "off"
customer_reviews.text: I seized up like suggested in other reviews, I wear a 7 and ordered an 8, OMG, big mistake, these shoes are so long that I trip over the toes. Too dangerous to wear so I just packed them away. I'm not good at going thru the return process. I do love the look of the shoe and really wished they would have fit. I ordered the ankle high, buckle, zipper blowfish shoes in my normal size and they fit perfectly. They are so comfy and I wear them a lot. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable and runs small
customer_reviews.text: The converse brand, Keds, or similar feel like I’m walking flat on the concrete after awhile but this has some cushioning in the sole so it’s more comfortable, but not as much as the pair I ended up keeping. Very cute style but it ran too small so had to return. Probably would’ve kept them if they fit because they’re so cute, but again not the most comfortable shoe for it’s type
customer_reviews.author: some day is today

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish & practical sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker! Second pair. So comfy and I hate laces so this is my kind of sneaker! There is also substantial toe room to spread your toes out which IMO too many sneakers lack. I ordered a 1/2 size up and they fit perfectly. I do wish they would put the sizes somewhere on the sneaker and not just the box b/c when I went to order another pair (1st pair bought at store) I couldn’t remember what size I bought. Glad I went the 1/2 size up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine G

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable summer shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a white canvas shoe for summer and this fits the bill perfectly. Received the shoes on a Friday wore them Saturday all day on a visit to my mom. We went shopping and had my grandkids for the afternoon. They are soooo comfortable! Every woman that saw them wanted a pair! I may have sold at least three pair for you! Fits great with no rubbing anywhere. Easy slip on style with modern unfinished seams. They go with everything! Wore with leggings, shorts and a sundress and they are super cute with them all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Third pair
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased the purple ones, then, white and wathed these. Original price was too high. But as soon as it dropped I was pressing CHECK OUT. They have not arch support, and there soles are very thin. They also have no traction. I would not recommend them for wakling all day.
customer_reviews.author: Gemiyneye Reese

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking—shabby chic—and comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these shoes—casual chic—and the fit runs a little smaller than expected, but they;re canvas and will stretch out. I like the elastic rather than shoe strings and they make the fit snug and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Have patience with the tongue
customer_reviews.text: I was very glad I took the time to read the reviews. I knew about the tongue being a little difficult and I am sure it will improve as the elastic straps loosen up with wearing. These shops just reached out to me. BUY ME! Sure glad I did, I love them they are funky and so cool and I am an 84 yo great grandma. Thanks Amazon and and Blowfish MALIBU
customer_reviews.author: Maizy

customer_reviews.title: A nice everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. I have a small but slightly wide foot so they seem a little narrow to me, almost like a tightly tied pair of converse. I usually keep laces loose but these don't have laces so I can't control that. But I've gotten used to the more fitted shoe which is probably the way most people prefer them anyway. I think they are comfortable just wish they had more grip on the soles.
customer_reviews.author: K_AmLove1

customer_reviews.title: shoe is finally on it fits good. I am not happy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit differently than any tennis shoe I have ever had. It is very difficult (almost impossible to get the back of the shoe over the heel.). The front of the shoe looks odd. When the.shoe is finally on it fits good. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lanway

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and fit true to size. I have narrow small feet and these are tight on my toes and have zero arch support (I figured they wouldn't have any for the type of shoe they are) wearing these for long periods becomes extremely uncomfortable. I wear the short ankle socks with these shoes and they rub them off about 50 times in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Good but tighter
customer_reviews.text: This is the same brand and style show I bought previously but in a different color and it was smaller than the size. I was lucky enough to find out I could microwave them for 30 seconds to stretch them more to my size. I did this a few times before they fit right. Love the brand but will only buy in stores from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a pair of cute white sneakers to wear this summer and these do the job pretty well, especially for the price. They look great with a sun dress or shorts. They don't look or feel cheap, which I'm always worried about when buying cheap shoes online. They fit exactly as expected and weren't tight in any areas. I wouldn't recommend them for long periods of walking as they don't have a lot of support. But for just hanging out in the summer, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: Looove these shoes. They are made well and the leopard look so cute! I went up a half size because some reviews said they were tight in the toe area. I wish I had just ordered my size. They are not tight in the toe area but mine are now a tad long. It’s not that much and I love them anyway. If I do order another pair later I will just order my size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size and really cute.
customer_reviews.text: Despise the fact that the toe is a little too narrow for me (remind me of Converse), and arch support is very little, I am absolutely in love with these sneakers. I have to wear a sock liner, which makes them super comfortable. They look adorable with everything and I always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Cute little shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very comfortable and easy to slip on and off. Runs just a little bit large. I usually wear a 6 1/2 and in some more narrow shoes a 7. I ordered the 7 and I probably would have been fine with the 6 1/2. Next time I will order true to size. I will definitely order another pair since so many colors are available.
customer_reviews.author: tts

customer_reviews.title: Nice pattern. Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly. I was hoping for better support, but i have messed up feet. High arches and constant foot pain. So to be fair, the average person would probably find the support to be enough. The insoles keep coming out which is annoying. But i love the shoes. They are so cute and i get a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: amberw88

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute they seemed to fit fine I ordered a 9 which is my normal size. I gave them 2 stars because of that. When trying them on I noticed a warning label on the box that warned that the shoes were made w/ some sort of material that is known to cause cancer. Which is why I only gave them 2 stars and not more. For that reason I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Knb2113

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Flintstone feet like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! I have VERY wide feet and was nervous that I wouldn’t be able to get it in the shoe, but I DID! I bought my first pair last summer and here we are in January and they’re still great. I wear them all the time and they kept their shape nicely - even being super broken in. I bought another pair as a backup for when/if these ones fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, there is little to no padding in the sole and they are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was thinking ordering shoes online. But I absolutely loved these. They were exactly what I was looking for. They fit great and the quality was good. I've had this brand before and they were really cushy, so I gave it a try. Unfortunately, there is little to no padding in the foot bed and they are very uncomfortable. I wore them around the office for about half an hour and the ball of my feet actually hurt. I'm really disappointed. I thought about buying an insert, but I think they would be too tight if I did that. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tight in toe box
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but a little tight around the toe box and not the easiest to get on. Hoping after they stretch out a little they'll be a bit more comfortable. Wish all colors didn't come with white soles. They make your feet look big and mine are already big enough without that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best Slip on and Go Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I need to invest in more colors because in my life, white is hard to maintain. It’s a comfortable shoe for sure and is very cute. It’s clearly not a shoe made to heighten arch support, but I’d say it has more than something like a converse or van. Definitely worth a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josi Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sporty
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cute shoes and they are very comfortable. I usually wear a 6.5 wide but based on the reviews, I ordered a 7.5 wide and they fit perfectly with enough room for a thicker sock. There is no cushioning which was a disappointment but with the thicker socks, it doesn't matter as much. I love how easy they are to slip on, too. Overall, I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra Ray

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable shoes. The bottoms are very slick on wood floors, smooth floors in general, no grip at all, but they’re comfortable. I wear a 9-91/2 depending on the brand. I ordered a 9 and had an inch left in the toe area. Feeling a little rubbing on my toes on the inside. I might wear socks with them until they’re broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Elysian

customer_reviews.title: High instep and wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I really expected to get these on over my toes and then come to a hard stop when I pulled them out of the box. A 9 was the largest size available, and there were no wide sizes for purchase. They went right on though! They're a little snug in the width, but the toe box and heel fit great and the material is so comfortable I really doubt the snug factor will bother me much. I fully expected to send these back when I bought them, but now I might be replacing some other shoes in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bickel

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of this same style, so I knew what the fit/comfort was like. I would not wear these for all-day walking, nor for athletic use. They are fine for normal everyday wear. I find arch support is good. Love the style, the available colors and patterns!
customer_reviews.author: wschroader

customer_reviews.title: Blowfish, my favorite sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: I have them in the light gray/blue and the peachy tan. Love them! Just ordered the camo also. I'll order enough to have a stock until I'm old. Seriously. Love them for everyday wear. While they don't have a ton of support, I've had foot surgery (10 months ago) and my feet like these shoes. Fit like a glove and are adorable!

customer_reviews.title: For long narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I am usually always an 8.5. These however were so weird. I really really wanted them to work but apparently I have short fat feet 😭. They were about an inch too long and punched the sides of my feet. Bummer! Sold them to my mom and her blessedly skinny, long feet.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable tennis shoe I've owned...
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and I have sensitive feet. I can wear stiletto type shoes and converse tennis. I have spent lots of money on name brand tennis shoes, flat shoes etc and I must say, these are my favorite flat -tennis shoes. I will definitely order again. I really can't believe it myself -haha.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aldrete

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading various Amazon reviews for the product as I needed “green” tennis shoes. And I liked the style. Very happy with style and fit. I wear a size 10 Med. I would say they are very casual, provide no arch support but stylish. Exactly as denoted in picture
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: A lot flimsier than I expected. The sole is quite thin, and hard. I had to buy inserts just to be able to wear them comfortably for more than a quick jaunt around the block. The appearance is nice, though, and I'm able to wear them with dresses, pants, shorts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D. Andres

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute shoe; however, the insole feels a bit lumpy, and you have to hold onto the tongue when you pull the shoe on, or the tongue slips into the shoe uncomfortably and is hard to pull out. Fine for a trip to the market, but I wouldn’t wear it for a long day of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Armchair Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Fit good, basic white, easily slips on and off, comfortable. I don’t need to worry about shoe laces coming undone because there aren’t any but instead elastic bands as a great stretchy alternative. Exactly as expected. I’ll be wearing them often. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large, buy down a half size
customer_reviews.text: These run a little big. I generally wear a 7, but I could have gone with a 6 1/2 for these. They also seem to be a little on the wide side. They look well made and they have a good thick sole. I wish they had better arch support, so I will probably add an insert. They felt stiff around the heel at first, but loosened up pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the Blowfish Marley shoe. I was looking for black to replace a pair that I've had, but nowhere on the internet is the black available in my size, so I decided to try this color, and love it. To me it's more of a greenish color than a grey, but I still like them. I wish that Blowfish would continue to manufacture this shoe so I could get another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: JoyC

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Casual!
customer_reviews.text: Coordinates well with most outfits, awesome color selection, easy to clean & wonderful price! This is the 2nd pair I have purchased bc it's my go to slip on shoe when running errands or going out. Zero arch support, but investing a decent THIN gel insert helps if no support bothers you. Will most likely purchase again & again! 😊
customer_reviews.author: MLeeAnnR

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy but they are slippery. There is no grip on the bottom and I have slipped many times in these shoes. Just have to get used to walking on certain surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Leckie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these shoes were so comfy! I usually wear a size 8, so I ordered an 8. They fit great. They’re light weight and flexible. The first day I wore them to work for a full shift and they felt like I’d alre broken them in. So comfortable. Heads up, the souls seemed a little slick walking around in my kitchen when I tried them on but within the first hour of actual wear they were fine. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rose

customer_reviews.title: may have to go up a `1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoe, but normally I wear a 9 to 9.5. The style I ordered did not have 1/2 sizes. I knew a 10 would be to big so I bought the 9 and they were entirely to small. Really needed that 9.5. Luckily my neighbor who wears a 8.5 tried them and they fit her perfectly. Sold them to her!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal L. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Netflix and chill for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: I may never buy another shoe. I’ll just continue wearing them out and buying them in a slightly different color ... cause I’m adventurous like that. Who needs laces and clingy crap when you could just wear chill kicks like these while eating avocado toast? I looooove them nearly as much as I love the gym, Netflix, and not talking to too many people.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 and these shoes fit so nice! I will order another pair for sure, they fit perfectly in every way - super comfortable. I read some reviews that they were slippery? I have not found that to be the case for me. I have walked in them on dry pavement and wet and not experienced any slippery issues, I haven't walked in them on ice or snow and why would I? I wear boots for bad winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tallgirl

product_meta.title: Blowfish Malibu Womens Marley Shoes, Latte Spots Print Canva
product_meta.description: Take your look old school with the distressed design of the Blowfish® Marley slip-on sneaker! Canvas upper. Easy slip-on wear with elastic stretch panels. Logo patch at heel panel. Contrasting fabric lining. Lightly cushioned fabric footbed. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
